revised_title: Numerical Values of the Sine-Integral, Cosine-Integral, and Exponential-Integral
tldr: The author presents tables of numerical values for the sine-integral, cosine-integral, and exponential-integral functions, which are essential in the evaluation of more complicated integrals in the field of mathematics. These tables provide accurate values for these functions, aiding researchers in their work and expanding the capabilities of the integral calculus.
